definition: sb or sth detested by all/target of scorn/anathema/cf. 老鼠過街，人人喊打|老鼠过街，人人喊打[lao3 shu3 guo4 jie1 , ren2 ren2 han3 da3]
(experienced action marker)
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
street/CL:條|条[tiao2]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
rat/mouse/CL:隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: RARELY has a central bank been lambasted so loudly by so many.
sentences.chinese: 很少有一家央行宛如過街老鼠人人喊打。

sentences.english: Because Wang Fa report, bass and the giant became a rat crossing the street.
sentences.chinese: 因爲王發的告發，劉利和擎天成了過街老鼠。

sentences.english: In recent years, performance management has become an object of hatred, people cry.
sentences.chinese: 最近兩年，績效管理成了過街老鼠，人人喊打。

sentences.english: He can only find a local shelter, just like such as "mice on the streets."
sentences.chinese: 他唯有另覓地方棲身，儼然如“過街老鼠”。

definition: lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
to rob the rich to help the poor
to walk right into the trap
to obstruct/to impede
to pretend that everything is going well
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
man behind the mirror/puppet master/string puller
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
to meet on the battlefield (idiom)
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
failed and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/beaten and in a hopeless position
